metadata.synopsis: College students (David Naughton, Debra Clinger, Stephen Furst) invade a minigolf course, an observatory and a brewery during a scavenger hunt.

reviews: Bobagem descartvel que traz, como grande atrativo, o fato de ter marcado a estria de Michael J. Fox no Cinema (e de ter emperrado a carreira de seus dois jovens diretores, at ento considerados promissores).

It's a pleasant, well-meaning little comedy, and it's obviously trying for the same kind of innocent, sophomoric humor that was so charming in "Junior High School." But it just doesn't have the same magic.
